Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra » Nissaya
Nissayasabhāga
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Nissaya
Nissayasabhāga
325.
1045Nissayapaccayā hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, avigate terasa. (17)
<< Nissayaup Nissayamissakaghaṭanā >>
